hero.title: OttoCollect
hero.subtitle: Discover the Legacy of Ottoman empire and it's successor countries Banknotes
hero.description: Explore, collect, and trade historical banknotes from across regions and eras. Join our community of passionate collectors.

features.title: Complete Platform for Collectors

catalogues.title: Catalogues

collection.title: Collection Management

community.title: Community
